level.text: The plan of merger or of consolidation and the filings required by § 31- 5803 shall be mailed to shareholders, to members, or to policyholders of the domestic merging and consolidating companies, and shall be filed with the Mayor according to § 31-5803.

A life company aggrieved by the Mayor's decision to disapprove a plan of merger or of consolidation with the Mayor under subsection (a) of this section shall have the rights, under § 31-5803, to judicial review of the decision.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-4443

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: Section 31-5803, referred to in (a) and (b), was repealed by § 17 of D.C. Law 10-44, effective Oct. 21, 1993.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Subsection (b) of this section is set forth above as it appears in D.C. Law 5- 160. The word "filed" should probably appear following "consolidation.".
